description:
Located in New York, 328 feet from Restaurant Row, Riu Plaza New York Times Square offers WiFi. The hotel has a terrace and fitness center, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant The Theater Buffet.

All rooms have a TV. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom with a bath or shower, with free toiletries and a hair dryer provided.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property and Capital Grab & Go offers coffee.

Times Square is 1312 feet from Riu Plaza New York Times Square, while Broadway Theater is 1969 feet from the property. La Guardia Airport is 6.2 mi away.

 Dear customer, the RIU Plaza hotels may request a deposit in cash or credit card during the check-in process.

The Riu Plaza New York Times Square Hotel charges a required supplement for
facilities for an amount of 29 USD (plus 14.75% tax), per room per night.
This supplement allows the hotel to provide our clients with extra services such as:

 Access to high-speed Wi-Fi in the rooms and common areas of the hotel up to
for 2 devices per person (max. 10 devices per occupancy)
 Two welcome bottles of water (without refill).
 Unlimited use of the computers in the lobby area.
 Access to the gym.
 Luggage storage upon arrival and/or departure until 9:00 p.m.

Ideally set in New York, Riu Plaza Manhattan Times Square has air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a business center. The property is non-smoking throughout and is located a 5-minute walk from Radio City Music Hall.

At the hotel, the rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms will provide guests with a fridge.

Popular points of interest near Riu Plaza Manhattan Times Square include Broadway Theatre, Times Square and Carnegie Hall. LaGuardia Airport is 7.5 miles from the property.

Located in New York City’s Times Square, this hotel features a fitness center and offers ticket services. Free WiFi is offered.

At The Pearl Hotel, guest rooms are equipped with iPod docking stations, cable TV and coffee facilities. Select rooms are furnished with a microwave and refrigerator.

Dining at The Pearl New York is available with 24-hour room service. The hotel offers an evening reception with wine.

Subway station can be found within 820 feet of the property. South Central Park and Rockefeller Center are 0.6 mi from the New York Pearl Hotel.

Located 1066 feet from the lights of Times Square and Broadway, this Midtown Manhattan hotel features a restaurant. Guests can enjoy books and free WiFi in each room.

The City Club Hotel offers contemporary rooms with feather down beds and a dark marble bathroom. Cable TV, a DVD player and an iPod docking station are included.

Room service is available at all times.

Guests of the City Club can purchase passes to the Blink Fitness fitness center.

The Hotel City Club is less than 1148 feet from the 42nd Street-Bryant Park subway station and 2116 feet from the Rockefeller Center.

Offering complimentary WiFi, the Riverside Tower Hotel is 2641 feet from the American Museum of Natural History. This nonsmoking property is 1.3 mi from the Metropolitan Museum of Art. Some rooms also offer views of the Hudson River.

Riverside Tower Hotel guests are provided with complimentary maps of the New York Subway and bus lines. The 24-hour front desk and the hotel tour desk are available to guests to plan their trip to New York City.

Zabar’s is 1056 feet away from the Riverside Tower Hotel. Central Park is less than 0.6 mi from the hotel. Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts is 1.1 mi away.

Located in New York and with National September 11 Memorial & Museum reachable within a 2-minute walk, The Cloud One New York-Downtown, by the Motel One Group provides a terrace, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers luggage storage space. One World Trade Center is a 6-minute walk from the hotel and Brooklyn Bridge is 1.3 miles away.

All guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The Cloud One New York-Downtown, by the Motel One Group has some units with city views, and every room includes a coffee machine. All rooms will provide guests with a fridge.

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Speaking English and Spanish at the reception, staff are always on hand to help.

Bloomingdales is 1.2 miles from The Cloud One New York-Downtown, by the Motel One Group, while NYU – New York University is 1.7 miles away. LaGuardia Airport is 11 miles from the property.

Courtyard New York Downtown Manhattan/Financial District has free bikes, fitness center, a terrace and restaurant in New York. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a business center and free WiFi. The hotel features family rooms.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. The rooms have a closet.

Popular points of interest near Courtyard New York Downtown Manhattan/Financial District include National September 11 Memorial & Museum, One World Trade Center and Brooklyn Bridge. LaGuardia Airport is 11 miles from the property.

This Art-Deco inspired high-rise hotel offers a midtown location and 24-hour dining. Times Square is less than 0.6 mi from the property and Pen Station is 531 feet away.

The rooms at The New Yorker, A Wyndham Hotel  are equipped with complimentary WiFi and flat-screen TVs. Some suites and rooms offer views of the Empire State Building or the Hudson River as well.

Take advantage of the concierge services at The New Yorker, A Wyndham Hotel  for assistance with Broadway tickets, guided tours, restaurant reservations are more. A gift shop, business center and a fitness center are available too.

Herald Square with Macy’s flagship store and other shopping destinations is 1056 feet away.

Located 1312 feet from Restaurant Row in New York, Pod Times Square features a restaurant, bar and free WiFi throughout the property.

Rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Certain units include a seating area where you can relax. The rooms are equipped with a private bathroom fitted with a shower. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Times Square is 1969 feet from Pod Times Square, while Jacob K. Javits Convention Center is 2625 feet away. The nearest airport is LaGuardia Airport, 6.2 mi from the property.

Attractively located in the Financial District district of New York, The FIDI Hotel is located a 11-minute walk from National September 11 Memorial & Museum, 0.8 miles from One World Trade Center and 1.5 miles from Brooklyn Bridge. With a fitness center, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property has a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests.

The rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. At The FIDI Hotel rooms contain bed linen and towels.

Bloomingdales is 1.9 miles from the accommodation, while NYU – New York University is 2.2 miles from the property. LaGuardia Airport is 11 miles away.

This stylish Manhattan hotel is located in the Theater District and is 2113 feet from Times Square. It offers a 24-hour gourmet pantry and rooms with a 32-inch flat-screen TV.

The modern guest rooms at Element by Westin Times Square are equipped with a DVD player, iPod docking station, and free Wi-Fi. They are furnished with a microwave, refrigerator, and coffee maker.

This nonsmoking hotel features an on-site gym with a variety of cardio machines. Bicycle rentals are available.

A breakfast buffet is served every morning at the Element. Snacks are sold at the 24-hour pantry.

Madison Square Garden is 1585 feet from the Times Square Element. NBC Studios and Rockefeller Center are 1 mi from the hotel.

Located in the Lower East Side district in New York, citizenM New York Bowery is minutes away from the nightlife and restaurants of Bowery. The property is around an 8-minute walk from Bloomingdale's and within 20 minutes' walk of SoHo, Lower Manhattan, and Little Italy. There is a restaurant and a shared lounge.

At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a desk, wall-to-wall windows, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with rain showers. The rooms feature a fridge and free WiFi is provided. Free high speed WiFi is available throughout the property.

With the room iPad, or the free citizenM app, all guests can control room lights, black-out blinds, curtains, temperature, as well as TV and radio channels. They can also stream from their own Netflix, Prime or Disney+ accounts (and many others), by connecting their phone, tablet or laptop to the TV via Chromecast (at no extra charge).

A buffet breakfast is available daily at the property. canteenM is open 24/7 and features an open kitchen with baked goods, light lunches and simple dinners. There is a coffee bar during the day that turns into a cocktail bar in the evening.

Guests can make use of the fitness center. In partnership with MENDO bookshop, New York Bowery citizenM provides its guests with coffee table books in a variety of fields such as photography, fashion, travel and design.

Brooklyn Bridge is 1.1 mi away, while One World Trade Center is 1.5 mi from citizenM New York Bowery. The nearest airport is LaGuardia Airport, 8.9 mi from the accommodations.

KAMA CENTRAL PARK has a garden, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in New York. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Strawberry Fields is 2 miles away and Lincoln Center is 2.3 miles from the hostel.

Columbia University is a 17-minute walk from the hostel, while Metropolitan Museum of Art is 1.7 miles from the property. LaGuardia Airport is 6.8 miles away.

Located in the center of New York, a 3-minute walk from Top of the Rock, Hilton Club The Central at 5th New York provides air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk. The property is close to popular attractions like Grand Central Station, Chrysler Building and New York Public Library.

At the hotel, each room is equipped with a desk. Guest rooms in Hilton Club The Central at 5th New York are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include St Patrick's Cathedral, Rockefeller Center and Radio City Music Hall. LaGuardia Airport is 6.8 miles away.

Courtyard by Marriott New York Manhattan/ Chelsea is a 5 minute walk away from the Pennsylvania Amtrak Station. The hotel also provides complimentary WiFi, luggage storage and free access to an on-site fitness center.

A coffee shop and a 24-hour snack store, The Market is located on the lobby floor. The restaurant next door that serves lunch and dinner can be accessed through the lobby area as well.

A Go Board, an interactive screen that helps you find nearby attractions and directions, is set up for guests’ convenience. They can also enjoy the complimentary use of the business center with three computers.

Every room is equipped with a flat-screen cable TV, a refrigerator and air conditioning. The private bathrooms come with complimentary toiletries and a hairdryer.

With 2 subway stations, the Penn Station and the Herald Square Station, within 1640 feet of the property, Courtyard by Marriott Chelsea is well-connected and easily accessible. Macy’s is only 2113 feet away and The High Line is 3169 feet from the property.

This Manhattan Hotel is less than 0.6 mi from Rockefeller Center. It features modern décor and flat-screen TVs in rooms as well as an on-site lounge and rooftop garden.

Pod 51 has a multilingual concierge staff ready to help guests plan their visit to New York. Pod 51 provides a list of complimentary, daily activities going on in the town and organizes 3 daily tours for guests during weekdays.

Breakfast is available at the on-site cafe. The on-site lounge, Clinton Hall, serves American cuisine for lunch and dinner and provides a full bar as well.

Rooms at the Pod 51 have MP3 docking stations and free WiFi. Each room is also equipped with a safety deposit box and a hairdryer.

Radio City Music Hall is 0.7 mi from Pod 51. Times Square is 1.1 mi away, and St. Patrick’s Cathedral is 2113 feet from the Pod.

Within walking distance of the Theater District, voco Times Square South New York, an IHG Hotel offers free WiFi access in New York, 2461 feet from shopping at Macy’s in Herald Square. Guests can enjoy the outdoor terrace and on-site restaurant.

Every room includes a flat-screen TV and private bathroom. Each room comes with coffee and tea facilities and a small refrigerator is available upon request. Some rooms offer a city view.

There is a 24-hour front desk, fitness center and business center at the property. The hotel offers a concierge desk, multilingual staff and signature voco Times Square South New York, an IHG Hotel cookie upon arrival.

New York Penn Station is 1312 feet from voco Times Square South New York, an IHG Hotel, while Central Park is 1.2 mi away. The nearest underground station is 34 Street-Penn Station, 787 feet from the hotel.

Set in New York's vibrant Garment District, just steps from the focal Times Square, Hotel Shocard Broadway, Times Square is a modern facility with a retro flair. Free Wi-Fi is available in every room and features include a trendy bar.

Guest rooms at Hotel Shocard are equipped with a laptop safe. Furnishings include a work desk and the private bathrooms come with hairdryer.

All American cuisine is served at the on-site restaurant along with signature cocktails later in the evenings.

Hotel Shocard is within a short walk of the Radio City Music Hall, Rockefeller Center and the Empire State Building. Adjacent Times Square Metro Station gives direct access to most of the other landmarks of the Big Apple.

This boutique hotel is located in the Financial District, 1066 feet from the South Street Seaport Museum. This hotel features a 24-hour front desk and business services.

Eurostars Wall Street offers spacious guestrooms furnished with modern amenities, including flat-screen cable TVs, microwave and refrigerators. Other services include a turndown service and wake-up calls.

Guests at the Wall Street Eurostars are provided with parking off site and free WiFi. A safety deposit box and free weekday newspaper are available in the lobby. Laundry services are also offered.

The Wall Street Eurostars hotel is located within 2297 feet of the historic Stone Street and Wall Street. The 9/11 Memorial and Battery Park are both within 0.6 mi from the hotel.

Hyatt Centric Midtown 5th Avenue New York features a fitness center, terrace, a restaurant and bar in New York. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 0.6 miles from the city center and a 5-minute walk from Bryant Park.

At the hotel all rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Hyatt Centric Midtown 5th Avenue New York provides some units with city views, and rooms are equipped with a coffee machine. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge.

The daily breakfast offers à la carte, American or vegetarian options.

The accommodation also provides a business center and guests can use the on-site ATM machine at Hyatt Centric Midtown 5th Avenue New York.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Empire State Building, Grand Central Station and Macy's. LaGuardia Airport is 6.8 miles away.

This New York City hotel is located on 44th Street and is 1056 feet from Times Square. It features guest rooms with flat-screen TVs.

Each stylish and modern room at Royalton New York features a bathroom with a slate and glass shower. WiFi is available.

Royalton New York is a design hotel with a large brass fireplace in the lobby. A business center is available .

Radio City Music Hall and Bryant Park are 2113 feet from the property. Guests can also find 2 subway stations within 2297 feet of the property.

Aura Hotel Times Square is located 531 feet from Times Square and 2113 feet from Rockefeller Center.

All rooms at this nonsmoking property feature a flat-screen TV, bathrobes and complimentary toiletries.

Guests at Aura Hotel can enjoy concierge service, 24-hour front desk, a fitness center and a bar.

Other amenities include a business center and dry cleaning services.

Bryant Park is 1056 feet from the property and Madame Tussauds is 1585 feet away. Empire State Building is 0.8 mi away.

The DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel New York – Times Square West is within 0.9 mi of Times Square, The Empire State Building and Jacob Javits Convention Center.

All rooms at the DoubleTree by Hilton Times Square West have a desk, 40-inch HDTV, coffee maker, in-room safe and black-out curtains. Guests can enjoy views of the river, Manhattan uptown/downtown skyline and/or Times Square from rooms on the higher floors.

The rooftop lounge, High Bar & Lounge, at the DoubleTree Times Square West offers unobstructed views of Manhattan. The on-site restaurant, Tranzit Restaurant & Bar, serves American cuisine for breakfast, lunch and dinner.

This hotel also has a 24-hour business center, a fitness center, 900 square feet of meeting space and offers room service.

Rockefeller Center is 1.2 mi away while Broadway theater, Majestic Theater, and The Port Authority Bus Terminal are within 1148 feet of the DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel New York.

Located right in the heart of Manhattan, this hotel is just 1 minute's walk from Times Square and within 5 minutes' walk of Central Park and Columbus Circle. Rockefeller Center and the Empire State Building are within 15 minutes' walk.

A flat-screen TV and a small refrigerator with free water are offered in citizenM's rooms, Bathrooms include Hansgrohe rain showers and oversize bathroom amenities. With the room iPad, or the free citizenM app, all guests can control room lights, black-out blinds, curtains, temperature, as well as TV and radio channels. They can also stream from their own Netflix, Prime or Disney+ accounts (and many others), by connecting their phone, tablet or laptop to the TV via Chromecast for free.

Free high-speed Wi-Fi and express check in are offered at citizenM New York Times Square. Guests can stay refreshed with 24-hour food and beverage service, including barista-made coffee and freshly made cocktails. iMac computers and printing services are available free of charge.

The hot & cold breakfast buffet comes with unique local treats, familiar favorites, and healthy options for everyone — including vegans and vegetarians.

Three outdoor terraces are provided at the New York Times Square citizenM, which features a state-of-the-art fitness center with yoga facilities. After working out, guests can relax with drinks and sweeping views of the city on the exclusive rooftop bar. The living room-style lobby features a contemporary art collection and plenty of space to relax.

Fifth Avenue and Madison Avenue are both within 5 minutes' walk of citizenM New York Times Square. The Museum of Modern Art is 10 minutes' walk away.

The Renaissance New York Times Square is located in Theater District and features 312 soundproofed guests rooms spread over 26 floors. It has 7 terrace guest rooms and 5 suites. Located on Seventh Avenue and West 48th Street, the property is 413 feet from the subway station on 49th Street.

All rooms at the property come with Renaissance’s own bedding and linens, dark-wood furniture and gold-and-blue accents. Floor to ceiling windows offers guests views of the city. Other in-room amenities include flat-screen TVs with plug-in connectivity panels.

Renaissance New York Times Square South has a fitness center, concierge service and an onsite lounge called R Lounge. Parking is available for a fee.

LaGuardia Airport is 9 mi from the property while JFK Airport is 17 mi away. Newark Liberty International Airport is 18 mi from the property. Times Square is 135 feet away.

Well located in the center of New York, Home2 Suites By Hilton New York Times Square provides free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. The property is close to Top of the Rock, Broadway Theatre and St Patrick's Cathedral. The property has a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage for guests.

Selected rooms come with a kitchenette with a fridge, a dishwasher and a microwave.

A buffet, continental or American breakfast is served at the property.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Radio City Music Hall, Rockefeller Center and Museum of Modern Art. LaGuardia Airport is 6.8 miles away.

The Hilton Garden Inn New York Times Square South is located less than 0.6 mi away from Jacob K. Javits Convention Center and 0.8 mi from Times Square. Complimentary WiFi is provided.

All rooms at this property are fitted with a flat-screen TV, coffee maker, microwave and mini-refrigerator. A desk with an ergonomic chair are also provided.

Guests will have access to free coffee in the morning and a fitness center. The 24-hour Garden Market will carry snacks and sundry items.

LaGuardia Airport is 11 mi from the property while JFK Airport is 17 mi from Hilton Garden Inn New York Times Square South. The Empire State Building is 1 mi away.

InterContinental New York Times Square is spread across 36 stories and offers accommodations with floor-to-ceiling windows offering views of the Manhattan skyline, Hudson River and Broadway Theater District.

Each room includes flat-screen TV, spacious work station, spa-inspired bathroom with walk-in rain shower, coffeemaker, mini-bar and hairdryer.

The Intercontinental provides a 24-hour gym. Located on the third floor with views of 44th Street, it features treadmills and free weights.

The InterContinental is within 121 feet of a Subway Station and 1056 feet from Times Square. Theaters, shopping destinations and restaurants can be nearby as well.

The Stinger Cocktail Bar & Kitchen welcomes patrons with a lively scene, craft cocktails, and an a la carte menu. The cozy atmosphere and tempting libations create a fabulous spot for pre- or post-event theater, late night gatherings, or a nightcap.

Located steps from Broadway theaters, The Time New York, part of JdV by Hyatt, features chic guest rooms by famed designer David Rockwell.

Every room features a flat screen TV, designer Moroso chairs and plush bed linens. The stylish bathrooms boast a rainfall shower, Frette bathrobes and luxury toiletries.

Guests receive full access to TMPL Fitness Hell's Kitchen as well as unlimited use of the hotel’s onsite 24-hour fitness center.

The on-site Italian restaurant, Serafina, serves Northern Italian cuisine and is currently open for breakfast, lunch and dinner.

The Time New York is located steps from Times Square as well as the famed Restaurant Row. The nearest airport is LaGuardia International Airport, 6.2 mi away.

All guests are welcome to join us daily for Wine & Cheese, hosted by our management team in the LeGrande Lounge at The Time New York from 5-6pm.

The newly renovated Historic Mayfair Hotel in the NYC Theater District

Located in the heart of Manhattan’s Theater District and just a short walk from world-famous Times Square, is the newly revamped Mayfair Hotel New York City, Ascend Hotel Collection®. Offering excellent value, amenities and service for its Midtown location, our boutique hotel will help you make the most of your NYC experience. Whether you’re here on business or treating yourself to that long overdue vacation, our updated hotel is the ideal place to stay and immerse yourself in the “Crossroads of the World”.

Discover local hotspots with helpful recommendations from our concierge service, available 24 hours a day. Catch a Broadway show at the Eugene O’Neill Theater right next door, or enjoy a walk to Times Square, Radio City Music Hall, Rockefeller Center and MOMA—all less than a 10-minute walk from our hotel. You can also spend the day taking in world class shopping in the Garment District, dining in Hell’s Kitchen, and sightseeing at the Statue of Liberty, Central Park, and so much more.

At our Big Apple hotel, we put you in touch with the city’s distinctive style. Choose from 73 newly renovated rooms with modern décor and essential amenities across seven floors. Deluxe, superior suites and a Grand Suite await guests ready for the ultimate New York City experience, many offering breathtaking views. You’ll also enjoy complimentary access to high-speed WiFi and wireless casting on a flat-screen TV during your stay.

Guests must be over 21 years of age to make a reservation. ID required at check-in. No exceptions. Guests attempting to check-in without ID, and guests under 21 years of age, will have their reservation(s) canceled and will be charged according to the terms of the reservation(s).

MOXY NYC Times Square, offers pet-friendly accommodations, and features free WiFi and a fitness center. Macy's is 656 feet from the property. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant and a rooftop bar.

All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV and air purification systems. Each room has a private bathroom. Extras include free toiletries, a hairdryer, pen pegboard closet with foldaway hanging desk, luggage rack, bench and chair.

There is a 24-hour front desk and a shared lounge. Guests can enjoy an evening drink at the roof-deck bar on the 18th floor with views of the Empire State Building - reservations required.

Madison Square Garden is 1312 feet from MOXY NYC Times Square, while Empire State Building is 1969 feet from the property. The nearest airport is LaGuardia Airport, 6.2 mi from the property.

Just a 5-minute walk from Times Square, this all-suite Manhattan hotel features an on-site 24-hour convenience store and suites equipped with free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, and a DVD player.

A fully equipped kitchen complete with a dishwasher is also in each suite at Candlewood Suites NYC – Times Square. There is a dining area and a seating area, as well as a work desk.

A modern fitness center and a business center are available on site at the Times Square Candlewood Suites. The front desk is staffed 24 hours a day. Weekly housekeeping service is provided.

Broadway and the Theater District are a 5-minute walk from this hotel, while Madison Square Garden is a 9-minute bus ride away. Macy's and the Javitz Center are both within 15 minutes' walk of the Candlewood Suites NYC.

Offering a fitness center, Hampton Inn Times Square Central is located in New York. Free WiFi access is available and guests can enjoy the complimentary breakfast buffet.

Each room here will provide you with a flat-screen TV, coffeemaker and ironing facilities. Featuring a hairdryer, private bathrooms also comes with free toiletries. Extras include a desk and a laptop safe.

At Hampton Inn Times Square Central you will find a 24-hour front desk and a snack bar.

The hotel is 984 feet from Times Square, 1640 feet from Restaurant Row and 1969 feet from Macy's. Newark Liberty International Airport is 11 mi away.

Featuring a shared lounge, bar and views of city, Aloft New York Chelsea is located in New York, a 8-minute walk from Madison Square Garden. With a fitness center, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property provides evening entertainment and an ATM.

At the hotel, every room comes with a desk. All guest rooms at Aloft New York Chelsea are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American breakfast.

There's an on-site snack bar and guests can also use the business area. Languages spoken at the reception include Mandarin, English and Spanish.

Popular points of interest near Aloft New York Chelsea include Flatiron Building, Penn Station and Macy's. LaGuardia Airport is 7.5 miles away.

Set in the Hell's Kitchen district of New York, SpringHill Suites New York Manhattan/Times Square South offers a fitness center. The property is close to several noted attractions, around 2297 feet from Macy's and around  1050 feet from Madison Square Garden. The property provides a 24-hour front desk.

Guests at the hotel can enjoy a continental or a buffet breakfast. At SpringHill Suites Times Square you will find a restaurant serving American cuisine.

Times Square is 0.7 mi from the accommodations, while Bryant Park is 0.7 mi from the property. LaGuardia Airport is 9.3 mi away.

Offering a restaurant and a fitness center, Club Quarters Hotel Grand Central, New York is located 0.8 mi from Times Square in New York. Free WiFi access is available.

Each room here will provide you with a large TV, an iHome clock-radio and a Nespresso coffee/tea maker with complimentary coffee and tea. Some rooms include a fully equipped kitchenette and a sofa bed.

At Club Quarters Grand Central Hotel you will find a 24-hour front desk, a terrace and a bar. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge and business facilities.

The Club Quarters Hotel is 656 feet from Grand Central Station, 656 feet from Chrysler Building and 1969 feet from Rockefeller Center. The Grand Central - 42 Street underground station is a short walk from the property.Central Park is 2 underground stops away.

Located in New York and with Broadway Theatre reachable within a 4-minute walk, The Blakely by LuxUrban provides concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. Popular points of interest nearby include Top of the Rock, St Patrick's Cathedral and Central Park. The property is a 4-minute walk from Museum of Modern Art, and within 700 yards of the city center.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, an electric tea pot, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. At The Blakely by LuxUrban each room has bed linen and towels.

Speaking English, Spanish, Hebrew and Hindi, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Radio City Music Hall, Carnegie Hall and Rockefeller Center. LaGuardia Airport is 6.8 miles away.

Located within 2113 feet from Rockefeller Center and Radio City Music Hall, this family-friendly Manhattan hotel is 2641 feet from Central Park. It features on-site dining and a sundeck.

The rooms at Omni Berkshire Place include a 49-inch flat-screen HDTV with streaming service and a marble bathroom. WiFi is also available.

The on-site gym features views of St. Patrick's Cathedral and cardio machines with personal TVs. Concierge services, including in-room massages, are offered.

A subway station can be found within 466 feet of Omni Berkshire Place. Times Square is 0.7 mi from the property.

Located in the heart of the Theater District and Time Square, The Belvedere Hotel is less than 0.6 mi from Radio City Music Hall and a 10-minute walk from Broadway Theater. Free WiFi is available.

All units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV, work desk, microwave and refrigerator.

Guests can dine in the on-site restaurant, which serves Brazilian cuisine.

The Belvedere Hotel offers a fitness center, daily morning coffee from 7am to 10am served in the Hudson Lobby, unlimited local calls, and package receiving.

For guests' convenience, the accommodations has a business center. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can provide tips on the area.

Carnegie Hall and Rockefeller Center are 0.7 mi from the property. LaGuardia Airport is 8.1 mi away and public transportation is lcated nearby.

This East Midtown Manhattan hotel is 9 minutes' walk from the shops and restaurants of Fifth Avenue. Free Wi-Fi is provided in the lobby. Central Park is 15 minutes' walk away.

A 37-inch flat-screen cable TV, large windows and city views are featured at Courtyard New York Manhattan. A seating area and a large work desk are provided. Room service from nearby restaurants is available.

Several shared seating areas are located on the 12th floor. Concierge services, a fitness center with city views and a business center are also available to guests at Midtown East New York Courtyard.

Table 866 is an on-site counter service restaurant that serves breakfast items and Starbucks coffee.

The 53rd Street Subway Station is a 1-minute walk from the hotel and offers easy access to the Empire State Building and Times Square. Saint Patrick's Cathedral is 10 minutes' walk from the property.

Ideally set in New York, Hilton Club West 57th Street New York has air-conditioned rooms, a fitness center and free WiFi. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The rooms at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge.

Popular points of interest near Hilton Club West 57th Street New York include Carnegie Hall, Broadway Theatre and Museum of Modern Art. LaGuardia Airport is 6.2 miles from the property.

The Carnegie Hotel in midtown Manhattan is a modern intimate boutique hotel, designed with fine architecture and custom Italian furniture. It is 528 feet from the Carnegie Hall and 1056 feet from Central Park.

Each room and suite at Carnegie Hotel has in-room safes, complimentary Rituals bath amenities, linen and bathrobes.

Complimentary continental breakfast and Wi-Fi access is offered to all guests. Relax in the lounge area with a complimentary wine hour hosted every night. Guests can also enjoy the 24-hour snacks and coffee service.

The shopping destinations of Fifth Avenue are within easy access of the the Carnegie Hotel. Columbus Circle and the Museum of Modern Are are 1585 feet from this midtown property, and Times Square is 2641 feet away.

Park Lane New York is a deluxe hotel with a European ambiance, providing views over Central Park and the New York skyline. It is only 2 minutes’ walk from the elegant shops of 5th Avenue and the 59th Street N,Q,R underground station.

Spacious and bright, rooms at Park Lane New York are fitted with oversize windows and fine linens. Amenities include flat-screen TVs and access to the on-site fitness center.

Enjoy a seasonal menu created by Joseph Fontanals at The Park Room Restaurant, or select from a wide variety of cocktails at Harry's New York Bar.

New York’s Museum of Modern Art, Radio City Music Hall, and Rockefeller Center, are all within 10 minutes' walk. With the park directly in front of the hotel, jogging and recreational activities are easily accessible.

A New York Classic, Remastered.

The property offers a combination of suites and rooms with varying views and low floor options. And starting in early 2022, our guests can also expect an elevated New York experience from our Upper Stories collection of rooms and suites perched on our topmost guest floors.
